amendment.description: To provide from amounts available for Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport, Gainesville, Georgia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1963 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1963 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S13122; text: CR S13122) To provide from amounts available for Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport, Gainesville, Georgia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1963 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Chambliss.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1963 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
